body:
The important part of deterministic is also backward part (e.g. for MaxPool). We should check that the grads are equal.

Additionally, non-determinism is often visible at the very small scale (think 1e-6), and `self.assertEqual` compares the tensors pointwise and accepts them as long as no element differs by more than 1e-4. Add a third `0` argument, to force bitwise equality.
